description: This file defines an Angular component 'HomeComponent' responsible for managing the home page of a notes application. It handles routing, filtering notes by notebooks or tags, creating and deleting notes, and updating note details.

classes.name: HomeComponent
classes.description: Angular component managing the home page, including note filtering, creation, deletion, and navigation.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes component, subscribes to route parameters and query parameters to set filters and selected note.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note in the active notebook and opens it.

methods.name: createNotebook
methods.description: Creates a new notebook after prompting the user for its name and navigates to it.

methods.name: updateSearch
methods.description: Updates the search query parameter in the URL.

methods.name: openNote
methods.description: Opens a note in the current route context.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note after user confirmation and clears selection if needed.

methods.name: updateTitle
methods.description: Updates the title of the selected note.

methods.name: updateContent
methods.description: Updates the content of the selected note.

methods.name: updateNotebook
methods.description: Updates the notebook association of the selected note.

methods.name: updateTags
methods.description: Updates the tags of the selected note.
